## Intro to Namuwiki

- **What is [Namuwiki](https://namu.wiki/w/%EB%82%98%EB%AC%B4%EC%9C%84%ED%82%A4:%EB%8C%80%EB%AC%B8)?**
  + The most popular wiki in South Korea
  + Started from a community that used to share information and evaluation for subcultural artifacts

![](Namuwiki_logo.png){#id .class width=700 height=300px}



## Motivation and Expectation

- **Why I choose this community?**
  + Love to share what I know
  + For fun and learning opportunities
  
- **What I expect from the participation?**
  + Get a better sense of the contributing process
  + Understand how my contribution is reviewed
  + Compare its policy with Wikipediaâ€™s neutral point of view policy

## Process of Contribution

- Create an account and log in
- Choose appropriate topics
- Edit or add the contents
- Get reviewed and feedback 

![](Namuwiki_process.png){#id .class width=600 height=300px align=right}

## Unique Features 

- **Unique policies compared to Wikipedia**
  + Namuwiki is a wiki, not an encyclopedia
  + Not abided by a neutral point of view policy
  
- **Forums and exclusive lists of topics**
  + Controversial issues or topics that need editing
  + Promote participation and feedback for sustained contribution
  + Allow different insights

![](Namuwiki_special lists.png){#id .class width=500 height=140px align=right}

## Conclusions: Expectations vs. Reality 
- **About participation** 
  + Interesting and uncomplicated process as expected
  + More engaged when my work got reviewed and feedback
- **About Namuwiki itself**
  + Easy to participate for contributors
  + Allow users various perspectives 
  + Try to encourage feedback among participants for sustained contribution 
  + Need further discussion for improving verifiability
